Normally Id have no problem with YIFY uploads, lately though the sound has been unbearable. Ive tried it through multiple outputs to verify that its not a hardware issue. It is only YIFY uploads as of late that sound like garbage to me. 

I appreciate all the work that is put into getting these uploaded, and im not compaining... free is free... just pointing out that there has been a shift in sound quality on my end. 

What i notice is a crackling and popping type noise during periods of loud or intense action on the screen for example Wiches green crackling lightning shooting out of her hands... makes my shit explode. Have ran through multiple sets of speaker, again, verifying that its not a hardware issue. 

I typically use VLC for everything i watch. Is it possible that somehow i jacked with a setting somewhere? I find it unlikely as everything else i watch is fine.

Again thanks for the work... hoping for a fix!
